text: Released VMatcher: State-Space Semi-Dense Local Feature Matching on arXiv.
Started internship as a Computer Vision Researcher at Spatial Intelligence.
Paper accepted at ECCV 2024 Map-Free Visual Relocalization Workshop!
Started MSc in Robotics and Computation (Artificial Intelligence) at UCL.
Graduated BEng with First Class Honours!
Started BEng in Mechanical Engineering at University of Glasgow.
